codeAnalysis.name: Month filter checks month AND year

edgeCases.name: No Results
edgeCases.details: Set filters that return 0 transactions → Check stats show 0.00, charts empty, no errors

edgeCases.name: All Filters Combined
edgeCases.details: Enable all 4 filters at once → Verify AND logic works correctly

edgeCases.name: Rapid Filter Changes
edgeCases.details: Change filter 5+ times quickly → Check for race conditions or stale data

edgeCases.name: Filter Reset
edgeCases.details: Apply filter → Reset to "الكل" → Verify count returns to original

edgeCases.name: Today with No Transactions
edgeCases.details: Select "today" when no transactions exist today → Should show 0 cleanly

edgeCases.name: Period Boundary
edgeCases.details: Test week filter on Sunday/Monday → Verify week calculation correct

edgeCases.name: Month Boundary
edgeCases.details: Test month filter on Jan 1 / Dec 31 → Verify year boundary handling

edgeCases.name: Empty Data
edgeCases.details: Load page with no transactions.json → Check sample data loads

edgeCases.name: Invalid Bank Name
edgeCases.details: Transaction with bank not in dropdown → Verify not shown or shown as "غير محدد"

edgeCases.name: Filter Then Change Again
edgeCases.details: Bank=X → Bank=Y → Bank=X → Verify consistent results

testMatrix.steps: 1. Select bank → 2. Verify only that bank shown
1. Select category → 2. Verify only that category shown
1. Select today → 2. Verify only today's transactions
1. Select month → 2. Verify current month only
1. Select bank + category + classification + month → 2. Verify AND logic
1. Apply filters → 2. Reset all → 3. Verify returns to initial state
1. Select impossible combination → 2. Verify 0 results, 0.00 stats
1. Apply filter → 2. Verify 3 charts update (category, bank, classification)
1. Apply filter → 2. Verify list updates and shows max 10
1. Bank=X → 2. Reset → 3. Bank=X again → 4. Verify same results

recommendation: Code looks good! Proceed with manual testing.
